actions.recommendation: Your BMI and body fat % were both raised. Focusing on making some of the healthier lifestyle choices will gradually help sustainable weight loss.
Your Hearing Test showed reducing hearing in the right ear and a full audiogram is recommended.
Regular female screening - Pap Smears and Breast Mammograms - is important in order to detect any irregularities early. You can book a consult with our practice for a Pap Smear.
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
